summary: Adds a set of light armor, for the UNP base main body, based on the Witch Elves of the Warhammer universe.
descriptionHtml:
Notes
======
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25008]UNPB BBP version, converted by Belisariu[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28898]CBBE version, converted by Newmiller[/url]


Featured in Skyrim Mod Series #57
[youtube]B-2tJ2A1UEw[/youtube]

Description
=========
Adds a set of light armor, for the UNP base main body, based on the Witch Elves of the Warhammer universe.
The armor can be found in game or crafted at any forge. 

Location
=======
- Bleakfalls Barrow \'word wall\' room (see screenshots for more details).
- Crafting requires the Elven Smithing perk and the following items.

Cuirass:
- 10x Ebony Ingot
- 10x Quicksilver Ingot
- 5x Leather
- 1x Skull

Boots:
- 5x Ebony Ingot
- 5x Quicksilver Ingot
- 10x Leather

Bracers:
- 5x Ebony Ingot
- 5x Quicksilver Ingot
- 10x Leather 

Tiara:
- 7x Ebony Ingot
- 7x Quicksilver Ingot

Requirements
===========
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709\"]UNP Base Main Body[/url]

Install
=======
Extract the archive.
Move \"meshes\", \"textures\" and Witch Elf Armour.esp to your Skyrim/Data folder.
Don\'t forget to check the Witch Elf Armour data file in the launcher.

Uninstall
=========
Uncheck the Witch Elf Armour data file in the launcher.
Delete:
- Witch Elf Armour.esp from your Data folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor\\WitchElf folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\WitchElf folder

Updates
=======
25/06/12 - Armor can now be tempered.
25/06/12 - Some clipping issues fixed.
	     - No pauldrons version added.
27/06/12 - French version added.
11/09/12 - Tiara added.
	     - Matching set bonus added.

Credits
=======
Thanks to:
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709\"]Dimon99 for the UNP body[/url]
[url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10251\"]Jojjo for parts used from Silverlight Armor[/url]
[url=\"http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/31340\"]Nexxon for parts used from Nexons Armory[/url]
Bethesda for Skyrim and the CK
Merci to Didier47 for the French translation

Legal
=====
Please contact me before releasing any of these assets.
author: Squizzo

files.name: Witch Elf Armour - No Pauldrons - Old
